author: David Lynch
title: Trump wants quick economic comeback from coronavirus, but China’s incomplete recovery hints at long-lasting problems - The Washington Post
description: Trump wants quick economic comeback from coronavirus, but China’s incomplete recovery hints at long-lasting problems The Washington Post GOP sounds alarm after 'quasi-official' Chinese outlet gains access to coronavirus press briefing, promotes... Fox News Re…
content:
The halting Chinese recovery offers sobering lessons for U.S. policymakers about what is shaping up to be a more protracted economic convalescence than the White House wants, according to business executives and economists.
A V-shaped recovery seems to be re… [+10176 chars]
